short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gloheal Share Screen extension enables users to share the screen with the remote participant during the consultation.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Users can share the screen while video conference is going on with gloheal application
